security_audit.summary: All five static findings are false positives. The static scanner misidentified YAML front matter as encrypted content, Chinese text as cryptographic algorithms, and content template placeholders as crypto references. This is a pure content generation workflow with no network, filesystem, or command execution capabilities.

Line 3 is a description field with Chinese text describing the workflow. No cryptographic algorithms or code present. Static scanner likely misidentified text patterns.
Line 154 contains placeholder text 'Angle 1 Description' in the output template. This is a content brainstorming field, not cryptographic code.
Line 155 contains placeholder text 'Angle 2 Description' in the output template. This is a content brainstorming field, not cryptographic code.

content.user_title: Create viral social media content with AI
content.value_statement: Transform raw ideas into high-impact viral content. This workflow combines structural thinking with human psychology insights to create scroll-stopping posts that drive engagement and shares.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes input素材 and routes to optimal content template (4 types)
Generates 3 content versions: viral style, deep insight style, and hybrid fusion
Creates 4 hook variations per content (counter-intuitive, pain-point, result-driven, suspense)
Scores content potential across 4 dimensions with reasoning
Suggests optimal posting times based on content type
Provides structured output with templates for easy customization
limitations: Does not publish content directly to platforms
Does not access real-time trending data
Requires user to provide source素材 or topic ideas
Output quality depends on input quality and specificity

use_cases.title: Accelerate content production

use_cases.title: Create high-converting copy

prompt_templates.title: Basic content request
prompt_templates.prompt: 请帮我基于以下素材创作一条爆款内容：[插入你的素材或话题]

prompt_templates.title: Specific template
prompt_templates.prompt: 请用T1热点借势模板，基于以下新闻素材创作：[插入新闻内容]

prompt_templates.title: Detailed angle
prompt_templates.prompt: 我的目标受众是[描述]，请用T4干货模板，基于以下经验创作：[插入你的经验/方法]

prompt_templates.title: Full workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: 请完整执行Defou x Stanley工作流，基于以下素材：[插入素材]，生成完整的路由分析、三个版本内容、hooks和发布建议。

output_examples.input: 我刚花了3000元买了一个课程，感觉被割韭菜了
output: 最佳角度：知识付费的本质是焦虑税
版本A亮点：极简金句‘你买的不只是课程，是心理安慰’
版本B深度：拆解‘学习幻觉’的心理机制
版本C融合：结合传播力与深度思考
推荐发布时间：周五晚8点（周末反思高峰）

best_practices: Provide specific素材 with real numbers, dates, or concrete events for stronger content
Clearly state your target audience to help the router match the best template
Review all 3 versions and combine elements that resonate with your audience
Use the hook suggestions to test different opening angles before posting
anti_patterns: Vague inputs like‘帮我写个爆款’ without context produce generic output
Avoid sharing sensitive personal info in素材 as it may appear in generated content
Do not rely solely on AI output without human review for brand voice consistency
The workflow is for content ideation, not for spreading misinformation

faq.question: What is T1, T2, T3, T4 in the output?
faq.answer: These are four content templates: Hot topic leverage, Counter-motivational insight, Humorous observation, and Practical value sharing.

faq.question: Can this publish directly to social media?
faq.answer: No, this skill generates content drafts. You must copy and paste to your preferred platform.

faq.question: What languages can it generate content in?
faq.answer:: The skill works with Chinese content. You can adapt templates for other languages by modifying the instructions.

faq.question: How many versions does it generate?
faq.answer: Three versions: Viral Stanley style, Deep Defou style, and the fusion combo version.

faq.question: Is the content unique or scraped?
faq.answer: All content is AI-generated based on your input. No external sources are referenced.

faq.question: Can I use this for business marketing?
faq.answer: Yes, T4 template is designed for business content including product promotion and lead generation.
